pthread_mutexattr_t Struct Reference
[Pthread]

A structure representing mutex attributes. More...

Data Fields

  • int kind

Detailed Description

A structure representing mutex attributes.

It should be considered an opaque record and accessed only using pthread_mutexattr_settype().

Field Documentation

int pthread_mutexattr_t::kind

The kind of mutex: PTHREAD_MUTEX_FAST_NP, PTHREAD_MUTEX_RECURSIVE_NP, or PTHREAD_MUTEX_ERRORCHECK_NP.
